movie.title: Yona Yona Penguin
movie.description_intro: An animated adventure about three children who travel to a fantasy land.
movie.description_full: An animated adventure about three children who travel to a fantasy land.

movies.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
movies.title_english: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
movies.title_long: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze (1991)
movies.summary: The turtles find out where the Ooze, the substance which made them mutate, came from. Unfortunately Shredder learns about it too, and uses it to enhance himself. So the turtles have to prove again who's the better ninja fighter.
movies.description_full: The turtles find out where the Ooze, the substance which made them mutate, came from. Unfortunately Shredder learns about it too, and uses it to enhance himself. So the turtles have to prove again who's the better ninja fighter.

movies.title: Virtual Weapon
movies.summary: A detective duo hunts a criminal organization, which is using an unknown liquid explosive material.
movies.description_full: A detective duo hunts a criminal organization, which is using an unknown liquid explosive material.
movies.synopsis: A detective duo hunts a criminal organization, which is using an unknown liquid explosive material.

movies.title: Tank Girl
movies.summary: Tank Girl (Rebecca) and her friends are the only remaining citizens living in the wasteland that is Earth, where all the remaining water is controlled by Water and Power, the mega corporation/government that runs the territory. While incarcerated at W + P, Tank Girl and her new friend Jet Girl break out and steal... a tank and a jet. After meeting some mutant kangaroo/humans, and rescuing her little girl (adopted by her friends), the kangaroos and the girls kick Water and Powers' butt.

movies.title: Happy Ghost II
movies.summary: The ghost of Scholar Stewart Pik reincarnates and is now a high school teacher named Hong Sam Kwai. Being the first male instructor of an unruly class that has exhausted more women teachers deemed possible, Kwai becomes a victim to endless pranks by his students until he is able to counteract with his gift of magical powers. But, when his job is on the line, he must find a way to get through with his students and restore his reputation.
